channel.title: Help got some errors from adding the <youre servername>+date/time+ players stuff
channel.description:
this is the errors i get: [code]client.java:43: cannot find symbol symbol : class SimpleDateFormat location: class client SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); ^ client.java:43: cannot find symbol symbol : class SimpleDateFormat location: class client SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); ^ client.java:44: cannot find symbol symbol : class Date location: class client String date = sdf.format(new Date()); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors[/code]
And also i have added silver bars to smithy's bar shop but i get this thing on compile....and it makes the moparscape screen freeze when im logging on....and that happens with other peope too.....this is the thing i get on the compile:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 000 2355 5000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:28)[/code]
Help please :) And im using TestScape[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 02:59:55 PM[/size][hr]help please?

item.title: Help got some errors from adding the <youre servername>+date/time+ players stuff
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

this is the errors i get:

client.java:43: cannot find symbol symbol : class SimpleDateFormat location: class client SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); ^ client.java:43: cannot find symbol symbol : class SimpleDateFormat location: class client SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); ^ client.java:44: cannot find symbol symbol : class Date location: class client String date = sdf.format(new Date()); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors

And also i have added silver bars to smithy’s bar shop but i get this thing on compile…and it makes the moparscape screen freeze when im logging on…and that happens with other peope too…this is the thing i get on the compile:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "5 000 2355 5000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:28)

Help please And im using TestScape[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 02:59:55 PM[/size][hr]help please?
